entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH IN EFFECT, Lanaudière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers or thunderstorms beginning this evening. Risk of a severe thunderstorm this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 17. Humidex 25. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low 8.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.summary: Sunny. High 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
